ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Ring Recommendation
ygData.msgSnippet: Heheh - I m 52 - even after paying 5k for SS arms I have about 4k in the bank... What about Charisma?  Maybe I m not itemed properly - but without that one
ygData.messageBody:
Heheh - I'm 52 - even after paying 5k for SS arms I have about 4k in the
bank...

What about Charisma? Maybe I'm not itemed properly - but without that one
ring I'm at like 124 now. Thought the CHA rings were important?

Slyde
-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) [mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 17, 2001 12:02 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Ring Recommendation

AC6 65hp, made by enchanters. velium bars are sold only in velious and cost
about 262pp. average price per ring is probably about 600pp. worth it, and
Slyde you should definitely get these for both rings, or platinum fire opal
rings if you can not afford velium yet (AC5 55hp, about 350pp each now).

Shada

> platinum fire opal is what i wear. i've seen some people
> list velium fire opal
> as well. are the velium ones enchanter made or do you find
> them off mobs?
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
